page.title: 09CHAPELS
page.content: {Mount Chapel}was re-built in l882 and it has 2O members. We have a very small Sunday School of 2 - my cousin and myself. We have some people going from the village of Mount to Warleggan. Both of these only have one service on a Sunday. {Warleggan {Chapel}was built about l855. The chapel had more people going when the {Trevoder Mines}were working. Warleggan chapel is very small and will probably close in rhe near future. The{organist}at this chapel is called Mrs. Dorothy Webster and at Mount chapel it is Mr. Henry Jory and Mrs. Vanda Masters. Once when some repairs needed doing the people in the chapel gave some money to help towards repairing the damage. Some people go to Warleggan Church and some to Cardinham Church.
